Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Darren Smith
Reviews.Content: I am satified with Camera with is very easy to use , Great quality pictures for price . Up loading simple as 123

Reviews.Title: Good camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: GARY PORTER
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use, easy to download, good pics, at a great value.  Great to take it with you anywhere.
